alert.note: Alert for White River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 11 at 2:20AM MDT until June 13 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR COLORADO FIRE WEATHER ZONE 202... The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 202 White River Forecast Area. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. Cold frontal passage late Monday will turn winds to the Northwest. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions could be favorable for easy ignition and rapid spread of fires due to low relative humidity and strong gusty winds.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
